title: Over 20000
body: WoW in the past 1 hour  Riot is having over 20000 players joining? 1st time I'm seeing this , in result when I do get in the launcher I cant que up for any games , I select my lanes and everything but  it  dosent let me press play button after chosing my lanes... + launcher is so laggy now cuz of to many players ....  I never knew that riot can have server overload, but its seems that Riot is having same issues, and finally its proven that riot is actually mortal. Its not a problem for me I just wanted to talk about this and see other player thoughs.

replies.body: We were indeed having some issues with the EUNE servers earlier today, but I believe most of it should be sorted out at this point. Have you been able to get back in and play games normally yet?

I Had the same problem when i saw like 20000 players logging in , fu@@  hell i freaked out and then everything started from there , i couldn't join the Q i abandoned games without my permission like whaaaaaaaat??????
